Equations Module

The equations module provides implementations of the compressible Euler equations in 1D, 2D, and 3D.

EulerEquations1D

class phrike.equations.EulerEquations1D(gamma: float = 1.4)[source]

Bases: object

Compressible Euler equations in 1D, conservative form.

This class implements the 1D compressible Euler equations:

\[\frac{\partial \rho}{\partial t} + \frac{\partial (\rho u)}{\partial x} = 0 \frac{\partial (\rho u)}{\partial t} + \frac{\partial (\rho u^2 + p)}{\partial x} = 0 \frac{\partial E}{\partial t} + \frac{\partial ((E + p)u)}{\partial x} = 0\]

where \(E = \frac{p}{\gamma-1} + \frac{1}{2}\rho u^2\) is the total energy density.

State vector U = [rho, mom, E], where:

  • rho: density

  • mom: momentum density (rho * u)

  • E: total energy density = p/(gamma-1) + 0.5*rho*u^2

Parameters:

gamma – Adiabatic index (default: 1.4)

gamma: float = 1.4
primitive(U: ndarray) → Tuple[ndarray, ndarray, ndarray, ndarray][source]

Convert conservative variables to primitive variables.

Parameters:

U – Conservative variables array of shape (3, N)

Returns:

  • rho: density array

  • u: velocity array

  • p: pressure array

  • a: sound speed array

Return type:

Tuple of (rho, u, p, a) where

conservative(rho: ndarray, u: ndarray, p: ndarray) → ndarray[source]

Convert primitive variables to conservative variables.

Parameters:

  • rho – Density array

  • u – Velocity array

  • p – Pressure array

Returns:

  • U[0] = rho (density)

  • U[1] = rho * u (momentum density)

  • U[2] = E (total energy density)

Return type:

Conservative variables array of shape (3, N) where

flux(U: ndarray) → ndarray[source]
max_wave_speed(U: ndarray) → float[source]

__init__(gamma: float = 1.4) → None

Numba Kernels

The module also includes Numba-accelerated kernels for performance-critical operations:

phrike.equations._primitive_kernel(U: ndarray, gamma: float) → Tuple[ndarray, ndarray, ndarray, ndarray][source]

Convert conservative variables to primitive variables for 1D Euler equations.

Parameters:

  • U – Conservative variables array of shape (3, N) where: U[0] = rho (density) U[1] = rho * u (momentum density) U[2] = E (total energy density)

  • gamma – Adiabatic index

Returns:

  • rho: density array

  • u: velocity array

  • p: pressure array

  • a: sound speed array

Return type:

Tuple of (rho, u, p, a) where

phrike.equations._flux_kernel(U: ndarray, gamma: float) → ndarray[source]

Compute flux vector for 1D Euler equations.

Parameters:

  • U – Conservative variables array of shape (3, N)

  • gamma – Adiabatic index

Returns:

  • F[0] = rho * u (mass flux)

  • F[1] = rho * u^2 + p (momentum flux)

  • F[2] = (E + p) * u (energy flux)

Return type:

Flux array of shape (3, N) where

phrike.equations._max_wave_speed_kernel(U: ndarray, gamma: float) → float[source]
